body_text:
I would like the recipe name slug to be passed in as a url param.  Right now you have to add your own URL param for reliable funnel analysis, especially since the message text that we use as utm_campaign is not unique in many cases.
If we're worried about name data leakage, I would also accept the recipe ID as a unique identifier.  In fact that would guarantee uniqueness so in some ways it's superior.
